snippet: In the last month, the Rangers and the Knicks have combined for 12 losses in 15 home games.

byline.original: Compiled by THE NEW YORK TIMES

lead_paragraph: In the last month, the Rangers and the Knicks have combined for 12 losses in 15 home games.

headline.main: The L Train Has Been Rerouted to the Garden
